Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Moses:

Text.Language: Twbh m~P% e~h~r/i e~jwn: pijwri e#y#u# abba Mwc/: nem Iwann/c Pi,ame: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf: O strong saint Abba Moses: and John Kame: that He may forgive us our sins.
